text: ON THIS DAY in 2002, Uruguayan @DiegoForlan7 scored twice as @ManUtd won 2-1 at @LFC: http://t.co/1spNDaad8f http://t.co/qWQxIAydMN

It's still Swansea 0-0 QPR, but here's how close Sigurdsson's free-kick was before Green clawed it out #SWAQPR http://t.co/0jNX3TuOnO
FULL-TIME Swansea 2-0 QPR. The hosts score twice in the last 12 mins to move up to 6th #SWAQPR http://t.co/vPp9lUH6KB
“I’m delighted with that. That’s as good a point as we’ve had all year" - Alan Pardew on @BurnleyOfficial 1-1 @NUFC http://t.co/sdCKCYmSSd

GOAL Everton 1-0 Hull (34 mins) Lukaku breaks the deadlock with a first-time finish after brilliant work by Mirallas on the right #EVEHUL
SUB @Arsenal bring on Giroud for Oxlade-Chamberlain. It's Arsenal 0-0 Southampton (65 mins) #ARSSOU
PHOTO @Alexis_Sanchez's late winner for @Arsenal was his 9th #BPL goal of the season #ARSSOU http://t.co/LFWNAjGlrT
Chelsea 3-0 Spurs. Hazard, Drogba & Remy get the goals as the Blues stay 6pts clear. More: http://t.co/GSUvW3hZpC http://t.co/7WniJSh99q

Was @NUFC's 2-1 win over Chelsea the shock of the season? Visitors to the Live Match Centre have had their say... http://t.co/DsbAjrrcMr
